snippet: A crime wave of sorts is plaguing the Resorts World Casino in Queens: people attacking gambling machines.
abstract: Police officers have become a familiar sight at the Resorts World Casino in Queens since it opened in 2011, but not for the kinds of crimes that had been predicted by opponents; police have arrested 41 people at the casino, accused of damaging its gambling machines after losing money; such demonstrations of slot and roulette rage are familiar to casino operators across the country.
lead_paragraph: A crime wave of sorts is plaguing the Resorts World Casino in Queens: people attacking gambling machines.

headline.seo: At Resorts World Casino, a Wave of Maimed Machines
headline.main: Failing to Hit Jackpot, and Hitting Machine Instead
headline.print_headline: Failing to Hit the Jackpot, and Hitting the Machine Instead
